level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

"Business incubator" means a building that provides low-cost space and services to eligible tenant businesses. The term "business incubator" does not mean a multi-tenant facility that offers space alone.
"Council" means the Council of the District of Columbia.
"Mayor" means the Mayor of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-71
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-71, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1209.01.
